results.summary: Technical assistance to support Angola on safety and quality standards towards a national sustainable and inclusive economic growth
results.content: Technical assistance to support Angola on safety and quality standards towards a national sustainable and inclusive economic growth

description: The main scope of this contract is to strengthen national capacities to ensure compliance with safety and technical standards and with WTO/SPS Agreement in order to increase and diversify sustainable inclusive economic growth. The intervention addresses the following three main fields of activity: Quality Infrastructure (Metrology, Conformity Assessment, Certification and Accreditation, Standards and Testing); Sanitary and Phytosanitary Measures (WTO-SPS Agreement); Technical Barriers to Trade.

results.summary: Provision of Technical Assistance to the Access to Justice Programme
results.content: Provision of Technical Assistance to the Access to Justice Programme

description: The Access to Justice Programme will provide support to justice sector institutions through the Ministry of Justice. Justice sector institutions include the Judiciary, Police, Prisons, Malawi Human Rights Commission, Office of the Ombudsman and Legal Aid Bureau. This proposed service contract will provide technical assistance to the institutions in the effective implementation of all the objectives/activities under the programme. The contractor will also be responsible for providing the long and short-term needed TAs and for the overall supervision, coordination and monitoring of the Access to Justice Programme.

results.summary: Support Facility for the implementation of the EU Japan Green Alliance
results.content: Support Facility for the implementation of the EU Japan Green Alliance

description: Service Contract to facilitate the operationalisation of the EU-Japan Green Alliance. Activities will focus on supporting policy dialogue and practical cooperation on shared policy priorities. Expected outputs will focus on enhancing EU/member state climate and environmental diplomacy and outreach in Japan; supporting cooperation with Japan on energy transition; strengthening EU-Japan bilateral cooperation, multilateral efforts including business exchanges to drive uptake of low carbon technologies, circular economy and resource efficiency, biodiversity protection and restoration frameworks, sustainable finance and instruments fighting pollution; enhancing EU-Japan exchanges on development of climate policies including carbon pricing, collaboration on research and development supporting green transition and supporting cooperation and exchanges on best practices between EU and Japanese cities on green smart city innovations.
title: Support Facility for the implementation of the EU Japan Green Alliance

Il s’agit d’une action de nature transversale, flexible qui se traduira par des activités variées à définir au cours de la mise en œuvre du partenariat, comme par exemple le recrutement d’experts, la fourniture de services techniques, l’organisation d’événements, de formation, la réalisation d’études, de mission de contrôle.

results.summary: Fortalecimiento de la Sociedad Civil en Honduras
results.content: Fortalecimiento de la Sociedad Civil en Honduras

description: El contratista trabajará con la DUE en Honduras en fortalecer la sociedad civil en Honduras a través del desarrollo de capacidades, el diálogo político estructurado y un entorno mejorado. Contribuirá a la aplicación de la hoja de ruta de la UE para la sociedad civil 2021-2027, apoyará la coordinación de las actividades ejecutadas por las organizaciones de la sociedad civil (OSC) en el marco de los programas bilaterales de los tres sectores prioritarios del MIP. Se planea: a) asistencia técnica para la preparación y aplicación de una estrategia para reforzar el marco institucional y jurídico de las OSC; b) el diseño y aplicación de un diálogo estructurado entre OSC, UE y sus Estados miembros, la comunidad internacional, el Gobierno y otros; c) la creación de un servicio de asistencia para aumentar sus capacidades en la creación o consolidación de coaliciones, la creación de redes, la comunicación estratégica, los estudios y análisis temáticos ,la digitalización, entre otros.
title: Fortalecimiento de la Sociedad Civil en Honduras

results.content: Technical Assistance for Promoting Sustainable Management Capacity of DoEUI and Capacity Building of End-recipients

description: The objective of the contract is to develop the institutional capacity of the Department of European Union Investments (DoEUI) of the Ministry of Environment, Urbanization and Climate Change and actual/potential end-recipients in fulfilling their functions related to the IPA funds via providing relevant consultancy services; delivering trainings; organising workshops, study visits, project site visits, etc. The Contractor will support the DoEUI Units in project preparation, implementation and control, in preparing action fiches and action documents under the Window 3 of IPA-III; support in implementation of investment projects; improving procurement documents; conducting on-the-spot control, providing any ad-hoc support needed, etc. The Contractor will support implementation of Communication Strategy and Action Plan and promoting programmes in environment sector and their contribution to the sustainable development of the country.
title: Technical Assistance for Promoting Sustainable Management Capacity of DoEUI and Capacity Building of End-recipients

results.summary: EU-SA Dialogue Facility 3.0 Technical Assistance
results.content: EU-SA Dialogue Facility 3.0 Technical Assistance

description: A current flagship in the EU’s portfolio in South Africa, the “Dialogue Facility” will be continued in the form of the Dialogue Facility 3.0. This much-hailed programme enables demand-driven knowledge exchange and dialogues towards strengthened policy development capacities. The Dialogue Facility successfully brings the aspirations of the EU-SA Strategic Partnership to a very concrete level as it brings together institutions and individuals. It will be adapted and updated from its current model.  The specific objective of the contract is to provide technical assistance in the form of a Programme Management Unit (PMU) to support the implementation of the EU-South Africa Dialogue Facility 3.0 that aims to encourage and respond to requests, mainly from South African Departments of the Government, for policy dialogues with the EU in various areas.

results.summary: Assessment of Climate Change Impacts on Lakes, Wetlands and Coastal Areas in Türkiye
results.content: Assessment of Climate Change Impacts on Lakes, Wetlands and Coastal Areas in Türkiye

description: This project aims to evaluate the impact of the changing climate trends on the water characteristics of lake, wetlands and coastal ecosystems. The principal aim is to assess coastal risks for society, economy and environment due to land loss, cultural services loss and human displacement due to sea level rise and to develop best possible risk assessments and adaptation strategies for vulnerable areas in Türkiye. Within the project sea-level of Türkiye's coasts of the Aegean Sea and the Mediterranean Sea (excluding islands) will be modelled, water budgets and water quality projections for three lakes/wetlands will be carried out, assessment indicators will be identified, risk analysis and assessments will be made for land loss and for fresh water, climate adaptation strategies and measures for lakes, wetlands and coastal areas will be defined, nature-based solutions will be identified.
title: Assessment of Climate Change Impacts on Lakes, Wetlands and Coastal Areas in Türkiye

results.summary: Technical Assistance to the Government of Malawi to Support the Implementation of Enabling Environment Reforms for Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises and Related Labour Laws
results.content: Technical Assistance to the Government of Malawi to Support the Implementation of Enabling Environment Reforms for Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises and Related Labour Laws

description: The contract shall provide technical assistance to the Government of Malawi in supporting the implementation of activities towards creating an enabling business. The contract shall provide technical assistance to the Government of Malawi in supporting the implementation of activities towards creating an enabling business environment for micro, small and medium enterprises (MSMEs) in Malawi and legal reviews and enforcement of related labour laws. It shall provide support in key areas of the entrepreneurship operating environment, e.g. entrepreneurship policy dialogue, analysing and addressing key legal and regulatory constraints affecting small businesses, formalisation of the economy, support towards legislative processes and implementation of related labor rights laws.
title: Technical Assistance to the Government of Malawi to Support the Implementation of Enabling Environment Reforms for Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises and Related Labour Laws

results.content: Assistance technique pour le programme d'appui à l'inclusion et à l'employabilité des jeunes dans le secteur du tourisme et ses chaînes de valeur «JIL-Siyaha»

description: Le marché s'inscrit dans le cadre de la mise en œuvre du Programme JIL-Siyaha, d'un montant de 10 000 000 EUR de contribution de l’UE. Il a pour objectif global de promouvoir la participation des jeunes à la vie socioéconomique des territoires, à travers le secteur du tourisme et ses chaînes de valeur. Le présent marché porte sur la mise à disposition une équipe d'experts qualifiés permettant d'atteindre les effets directs. L’assistance technique fournira un appui à la DNP et aux bénéficiaires, tout au long du programme et de manière permanente, pour la mise en œuvre, la coordination et le suivi du Programme y compris sa visibilité. L’AT aura la responsabilité de fournir au pouvoir adjudicateur des éléments de contenu, de suivi efficace et efficient et de monitoring. L’assistance fournira un appui en termes, notamment, de contenu technique et d’organisation logistique dans le cadre de ce marché.
title: Assistance technique pour le programme d'appui à l'inclusion et à l'employabilité des jeunes dans le secteur du tourisme et ses chaînes de valeur «JIL-Siyaha»

results.summary: Secretariat to the EU Sustainable Finance Advisory Hub
results.content: Secretariat to the EU Sustainable Finance Advisory Hub

description: The purpose of the Sustainable Finance Advisory Hub, of which this contract will be part, is to help stakeholders in low-and middle-income countries scale up sustainable finance. It will support them in building a conducive environment for sustainable finance (e.g. development of sustainable finance frameworks, support to issue green bonds and other sustainability-related instruments, in line with international good practice and, to the extent possible, building on the EU experience). The Hub will be implemented in cooperation with a selected number of EU Member States' Agencies, Development Finance Institutions and International Organisations. This service contract consists in provision of support to the Hub, functioning as a secretariat. Activities under this contract will include i.a.:  treatment of requests for technical assistance, overall coordination, monitoring and reporting, quality assurance, organization of events, community engagement and visibility activities
title: Secretariat to the EU Sustainable Finance Advisory Hub

results.summary: Supply of Computer Equipment and Multimedia Room Equipment for Sector for Prevention of Money Laundering and Terrorist Financing
results.content: Supply of Computer Equipment and Multimedia Room Equipment for Sector for Prevention of Money Laundering and Terrorist Financing

description: Subject of the contract is supply, delivery, unloading, testing, putting into operation and where requested installation and commercial warranty for relevant items of IT and multimedia room equipment for sector for prevention of money laundering and terrorist financing within Police Directorate. Since most of the information being processed on daily basis in sector is classified, equipment used for this purpose must be protected from emanating spurious transmissions in line with Law on Data Secrecy and Regulation on Closer Conditions and Manner of Implementation of Information Measures for Protection of Classified Information. Part of required equipment is necessary for safekeeping of classified information and documents, used in daily operation, which must be deposited in line with the above-mentioned legislation. Main objective of contract is to enable SPMLTF to receive and analyse data in line with Law on Data Secrecy, Law on Information Security and Law on Personal Data Protection.

results.summary: Mobilisation d’une Assistance Technique pour appuyer la coordination et le suivi du programme « Réussir Ensemble en Mauritanie »
results.content: Mobilisation d’une Assistance Technique pour appuyer la coordination et le suivi du programme « Réussir Ensemble en Mauritanie »

description:
Mobilisation d’une Assistance Technique pour appuyer le programme « Réussir Ensemble en Mauritanie ». 

Ce programme vise l’amélioration de l’accès aux opportunités d’emploi pour tou(te)s les jeunes résident(e)s en Mauritanie, avec un focus particulier sur l’inclusivité des mécanismes de formation technique et professionnelle et de soutien à l’entrepreneuriat. 
Le programme se divise en trois composantes qui seront mises en œuvre par trois agences. De plus, une assistance technique, qui fait l’objet de ce marché, assurera la coordination de l’Action.

Les objectifs spécifiques de ce programmes incluent i) l’amélioration des aptitudes et des compétences ; ii) l’amélioration de l’accès à l’emploi et le soutien de l’entrepreneuriat ; iii) l’amélioration de l’accès à l’information concernant les opportunités qui seront ouvertes aux résidents étrangers. 

L’Assistance Technique intégrée au Ministère de l’emploi et de la formation professionnelle (MEFP) sera mobilisée en vue de coordonner l’Action et de conduire un suivi régulier de sa mise en œuvre sur la base des indicateurs qui seront identifiés dans un cadre logique commun aux trois composantes. L’Assistance technique suivra aussi les activités de visibilité qui seront planifiées pour assurer la cohérence des messages diffusés. Elle sera également en charge du renforcement des capacité du MEFP en coordination avec les actions de renforcement qui seront menées par les autres composantes de l’Action. Enfin, elle aura à identifier et à répondre aux besoins spécifiques qui seront identifiés le long de la mise en œuvre à travers de la mobilisation d’assistances techniques de courte durée et de la réalisation d’études et analyses pertinentes.  

Le Programme se déroulera sur une période de 4 ans.
title: Mobilisation d’une Assistance Technique pour appuyer la coordination et le suivi du programme « Réussir Ensemble en Mauritanie »

results.summary: Supply of Equipment for Response to Marine Pollution Incidents
results.content: Supply of Equipment for Response to Marine Pollution Incidents

description: This procurement is financed under the IPA 2017 country action programme titled ‘Support to the Transport sector in Montenegro’ (IPA/2017/039-816/01/ME/Transport). In order to fight against potential risks of pollution and react in a time responsive manner against oil spills from vessel and off shore oil platforms in Montenegro sea, port infrastructures, mainly at Bar and Kotor, require to be equipped with the adequate equipment in accordance with IMO Conventions and EU regulations. Equipment consist inter-alia of multipurpose response vessels, oil inflatable offshore booms for oil spills, hydraulic storage reels for booms, skimmer with hoses, portable hydraulic diesel power pack, floating towable storage tanks, sorbents and absorbent booms, portable fire-fighting water pump and associated trainings.

results.summary: Support to EU Film Festivals - phase II
results.content: Support to EU Film Festivals - phase II

description: The proposed action will strengthen the EU's ability to engage meaningfully with selected audiences in third countries fostering mutual understanding and intercultural dialogue. It will facilitate the organisation of EU Film Festivals through the creation of a repository of European films and the organisation of side-events that will create spaces for intercultural dialogue. The action will prepare a curated repository of high quality European movies (e.g. selection, negotiation/acquisition of rights, distribution, consolidation of existing repositories of available European movies, subtitling) and will  also provide technical assistance (e.g. hiring of curators, support for local partnerships, and support in branding and communication activities) to the organization of EU Film Festivals in selected partner countries across the world.
title: Support to EU Film Festivals - phase II

results.summary: Feasibility Study for pre-primary classrooms and schools’ construction in Rwanda
results.content: Feasibility Study for pre-primary classrooms and schools’ construction in Rwanda

description: This assignment aims to: enable the European Investment Bank (EIB) to carry out its full due diligence and appraise a loan operation for future investments in pre-primary infrastructure in Rwanda; to assess and critically review proposals to improve this infrastructure and recommend a prioritisation for investment by the EIB and the EU, on the basis of data analysis and field visits; to determine the market or demand-supply, technical, operational, social, environmental, financial, and economic viability of the project for the construction of pre-primary classrooms; to provide information on the appropriateness and contribution of the project to the national socio-economic development plan and sector policies and expenditure plans as well as the strategy, sectoral, regional and provincial development plans; to provide expert advice and capacity building to the Ministry of Education in its core functions of student data collection, infrastructure planning, monitoring and evaluation.
title: Feasibility Study for pre-primary classrooms and schools’ construction in Rwanda

results.content: Local Audit Framework Contract 2021: Location – Kenya, Somalia and East Africa Region

description: A local audit framework agreement with various audit companies with re-opening of competition. Specific contracts under the local service audit framework contract will be global price contracts.The objective is to put in place a quick tool to contract auditors to perform audits or verifications of entities receiving funds from external aid programmes financed by the European Union. The local audit framework contract (FWC) will be a FWC with re-opening of competition and will be awarded to several tenderers (a minimum of 3 and a maximum of 4). During implementation of the local audit framework contract, the framework contractors receive requests for services with terms of reference whose various models can be found at: https://ec.europa.eu/international-partnerships/audit-and-control_en and they make a specific offer and a specific contract is awarded to the most economically advantageous offer. The local audit FWC duration is 2 years with a possibility of extension period of 2 years.
title: Local Audit Framework Contract 2021: Location – Kenya, Somalia and East Africa Region

results.summary: Supervision of works for Construction of the Clinic for Dermatovenerology and the Clinic for Infectious Disease
results.content: Supervision of works for Construction of the Clinic for Dermatovenerology and the Clinic for Infectious Disease

In this regard the Contract will consist of all activities needed to conduct the subsequent supervision services during the entire implementation period of the respective works contract until issuing the Final Acceptance Certificate and Final statement of account. results.content: Strategic foresight hub

description: The Overall Objective of this action is to contribute to reinforcing EU foreign policy priorities by supporting the development of a hub for strategic foresight and analysis. In particular the action will contribute to support EU foreign policy priorities by supporting the development of EU foresight and analysis focusing on:  multilateralism, battle of narratives, peace/security/defense, disinformation and terrorism; facilitate the promotion of EU interests and values as well as the push for EU offensive interests worldwide, but mainly in G20 countries and strategic partners, among others.
title: Strategic foresight hub

results.summary: Development and implementation of the software and purchase of the hardware for IT systems in data collection and management in crisis situations within Public Health Emergency Operations Centre
results.content: Development and implementation of the software and purchase of the hardware for IT systems in data collection and management in crisis situations within Public Health Emergency Operations Centre

description: The subject of the contract is development of IT system in the field of data collection and management in crisis situations. It combines both services for the development and implementation of the software for a data warehouse and a supply of the underlying IT hardware required for the use and management of the system (to be purchased using the budget for incidentals under a service contract). The System should be developed and the hardware installed in the future Public Health Emergency Operating Center (PHEOC). The objective of this procurement is to contribute to strengthening capacities of the Institute of Public Health of Montenegro in order to respond effectively to public health requirements for all future outbreaks of contagious diseases in the country.
title: Development and implementation of the software and purchase of the hardware for IT systems in data collection and management in crisis situations within Public Health Emergency Operations Centre

results.summary: Communication et visibilité du partenariat UE - Haïti
results.content: Communication et visibilité du partenariat UE - Haïti

L'objectif général du projet est de renforcer une perception selon laquelle l’Union européenne est un partenaire clé pour le développement durable et l’avenir social, économique et politique d’Haïti. L’objectif particulier est d'accroître la compréhension d’une multitude de publics des valeurs et de l’action de l’UE pour les femmes et les hommes d’Haiti et le développement du pays.
title: Communication et visibilité du partenariat UE - Haïti

description: The overall objective (Impact) to which this action contributes is:To continue further building and strengthening of the capacities of the CFCU aiming to ensure efficient and effective management and implementation of EU assistance funds to Montenegro. The specific objectives of this contract are as follows: • To support CFCU in the contracting and implementation of the projects financed under programmes for which CFCU has been recognised as contracting authority/implementing agency and contribute to the achievement of its objectives;• To further improve the administrative capacities of CFCU for efficient and effective processes of management of EU assistance funds to Montenegro with a special focus on IPA III perspective;• To prepare administrative structure in the CFCU for IMBC with ex-post control;• To support establishment of the basis for the efficient usage of ESI Funds.

results.summary: Reuse of treated urban wastewater for different alternatives
results.content: Reuse of treated urban wastewater for different alternatives

National Water Reuse Master Plan which contains the evaluation of Türkiye’s selected 200 urban wastewater treatment plants reuse alternatives will be prepared in the project. A legislation will be drafted on different water reuse alternatives. Also, design projects for different reuse alternatives the selected 7 pilot regions wastewater treatment plants and their tender documents and funding application documents will be prepared. Activities in order to increase staff capacity and raise awareness of relevant stakeholders will be carried out.

results.summary: EU-Malaysia Cooperation Facility
results.content: EU-Malaysia Cooperation Facility

description: The EU-Malaysia Cooperation Facility will support policy dialogues, outreach and strategic partnerships on a wide range of issues and with a diversity of stakeholders relevant to EU-Malaysia relations. This will include policy areas such as: political affairs, trade and investment, security, gender equality, women and youth empowerment, environment, climate change, the UN sustainable development goals (SDGs), good governance, human rights, rule of law, science and research, etc. In order to support the policy dialogues, outreach and strategic partnerships, the contractor will provide a broad range of services, including inter alia: technical assistance, capacity building, policy advisory services (for e.g. provision of specific technical expertise, preparation of studies, organisation of trainings, seminars, and conferences, communication and visibility activities and materials, event management, translation and interpretation, project management, etc.).

results.summary: Increasing the capacity of institutions harmonising and implementing of EU acquis in the area of Competitiveness and Innovation
results.content: Increasing the capacity of institutions harmonising and implementing of EU acquis in the area of Competitiveness and Innovation

description: This action will aim to strengten capacities of relevant institutions dealing with legal harmonisation, enforcement and implementation of the EU acquis in the area of Competitiveness and Innovation, more specifically various public administration institutions and non-state stakeholders in the areas of services, standardization, accreditation, competition and state aid.The ultimate goal of the intervention will be to further increase awareness and knowledge related to all EU acquis among all relevant actors.The updated Montenegro’s Programme of Accession to the European Union 2019-2020 foresees alignment with wide list of acquis related with Chapter 1, Chapter 3, Chapter 7, Chapter 8, Chapter 9, Chapter 28. results.content: Technical Assistance to Land Governance and Management Systems in Zambia

results.summary: Provision of equipment and technical capacities for the judicial institutions
results.content: Provision of equipment and technical capacities for the judicial institutions

description: Reinforcing judicial security by advancing technical equipment is one of the priorities set by relevant judicial coordinating bodies. It is also necessary to assure consistent security standards in the buildings and enhance level of technical equipment. Good technological solutions in relation to video-surveillance and control should compensate for lack of human resources. Therefore, 3 projects on “system for remote access control and video-surveillance” will fully digitize system for over 20 institutions. These projects are part of a wider program to cut down costs of surveillance, manning distant judicial buildings and assuring consistent high security standards for buildings and the proceedings in BiH.
title: Provision of equipment and technical capacities for the judicial institutions

results.summary: Enhancing Economic Governance Facility
results.content: Enhancing Economic Governance Facility

description: The European Commission endorsed the financing decision for the implementation of the EU-Viet Nam Enhancing Economic Governance Programme in December 2020. The programme has two project components providing technical assistance to the Ministry of Planning and Investment (MPI) and the Ministry of Finance (MOF) respectively.The purpose of this procurement is to procure consultancy services to support the implementation of component 1 with the MPI. The budget for this component is EUR 5.5 million maximum. It aims to achieve the following results:(i) strengthened state planning management;(ii) improved doing business environment;(iii) improved public investment management;(iv) strengthened public procurement management.
